RBesT: R Bayesian evidence synthesis tools

Tool-set to support Bayesian evidence synthesis. This includes meta-analysis, (robust) prior derivation from historical data, operating characteristics and analysis (1 and 2 sample cases). Please refer to Weber et al. (2021) for details on applying this package while Neuenschwander et al. (2010) and Schmidli et al. (2014) explain details on the methodology.

Getting Started

To get a quick overview over the package functionality, please refer to the introductory vignettes. We recommend starting with the Getting started with RBesT (binary) vignette as a first read.
